publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4557 Rob Gibson: Sakchai Makao—That the Parliament notes that Sakchai Makao has resided in Shetland for 13 years; considers that Sakchai Makao has made a positive contribution to the local community both before and after his prison sentence; recognises Sakchai Makao’s good standing within that community and the widespread support that he has received from people from Shetland and further afield, and notes the concerns that have been expressed in relation to his recent arrest and possible deportation.

S2M-4557 Sakchai Makao (lodged on 14 June 2006) Jim Mather*, Ms Sandra White*, Stewart Stevenson*, Patrick Harvie*, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Robin Harper*, Alex Neil*, Bruce Crawford*, Shiona Baird*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Rosie Kane*, Colin Fox*, Linda Fabiani*, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Tommy Sheridan*

S2M-4557 Rob Gibson: Sakchai Makao—That the Parliament notes that Sakchai Makao has resided in Shetland for 13 years; considers that Sakchai Makao has made a positive contribution to the local community both before and after his prison sentence; recognises Sakchai Makao’s good standing within that community and the widespread support that he has received from people from Shetland and further afield, and notes the concerns that have been expressed in relation to his recent arrest and possible deportation. Supported by: Jim Mather, Ms Sandra White, Stewart Stevenson, Patrick Harvie, Carolyn Leckie, Frances Curran, Robin Harper, Alex Neil, Bruce Crawford, Shiona Baird, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Roseanna Cunningham, Rosie Kane, Colin Fox, Linda Fabiani, Eleanor Scott, Ms Maureen Watt, Tommy Sheridan, Chris Ballance*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-4557 Sakchai Makao (lodged on 14 June 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4557 Sakchai Makao (lodged on 14 June 2006) Donald Gorrie*
